title: Page Style
content:
# Page Style

2022-07-03 18:44

The page style is defined by the `.acss` file in the `/pages` directory.

Each page will have a root element `page`, the background color or page height can be configured, for example.

copy

```css
page {
  background-color: #fff;
}
```

The detail information about acss can be referred in [ACSS](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/framework_acss-reference).
